title: Legoland has launched a huge sale on annual passes but be quick
text:

Legoland Windsor is giving families the chance to bag a whole year of fun at the theme park without breaking the bank in its latest sale.

The theme park has slashed prices on its annual passes, with savings of up to 30 per cent.

In fact, you can currently nab annual passes from £62pp instead of the usual price of £89pp.

Considering the cheapest day tickets start from £36pp when booked online, you'd only need to visit twice to get your money's worth.

You can already book the discounts in the Legoland annual pass sale online but you'll want to do so by the 3rd November 2019, when the sale ends.

You can also buy the discounted annual passes at the gate if you visit the theme park.

As well as offering you year-round entry to the resort (although there are some dates excluded), the annual pass offers heaps of extra perks such as discounted parking as well as discounted rates to Legoland for Christmas.

If you've never been to Legoland and you're not sure you want to commit to a whole season, the good news is that you can currently bag cheap day tickets from £36pp which include entry to the resort's Halloween and fireworks events, both of which are running over the October half term dates.

Alternatively you may want to check out our guide to the best Legoland deals and discounts with top tips on where to find discounts as well as extra money-saving offers like meal deals.

If the park is too far from home to justify a day out, you can also find overnight stays at the resort including the LEGOLAND Castle Hotel and the LEGOLAND Resort Hotel with their brilliant themed rooms.

The short breaks start from £94pp and usually include breakfast, park entry and early access to some of the rides and attractions.

On a budget? You can also find deals at Legoland partner hotels from £47pp which include breakfast as well as entry to the park.
description: Legoland Windsor has slashed prices on its annual passes in a huge sale but the deal's not on for long
